ResearchProjectDef.label: caretaker drones
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows your colony to build the caretaker drone station. Caretaker drones can haul, do basic work, clean and fight fires. Craft drone modules at the robotic machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: construction drones
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows your colony to build the construction drone station. Construction drones can construct and mine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: growing drones
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows your colony to build the growing drone station. Growing drones can sow, harvest and cut plants. Unlike the cultivator, growing drones do not have a range.
